Comment: My guess is his buddy Kevin Sorbo called him. Just look at his own shows, past and coming -  * **Hercules: The Legendary Journeys (1995–1999)** This series, along with its preceding TV movies, was filmed entirely in **New Zealand**. The country's diverse landscapes provided the backdrop for the show's mythological setting. * **Kull the Conqueror (1997)** This fantasy film was shot in **Slovakia and Croatia**, utilizing Eastern Europe's historic architecture and landscapes to depict its ancient world. * **Andromeda (2000–2005)** The science fiction series was filmed in **Canada**, a common location for sci-fi productions due to its versatile settings and production facilities. * **Left Behind: Rise of the Antichrist (2023)** This film was shot in **Calgary, Alberta, Canada**, taking advantage of the city's urban and natural environments. * **The American Miracle: Our Nation Is No Accident (2025)** This upcoming film includes scenes filmed in the **United Kingdom**, reflecting its historical themes.
